Interface GameMode

All Known Implementing Classes:
ClassicGameMode, YingYangMode
public interface GameMode
Interface defining the structure and behavior of a game mode.

  • Method Summary

    Modifier and Type
    Method
    Description
    List<Integer>
    getAllowedNumOfPlayers()
    Returns a list of allowed numbers of players for the game mode.
    Board
    getBoard()
    Returns a board specific to the game mode.
    Player
    getWinner(Board board, List<Player> players)
    Checks if there is a winner at the current state of the game.
    void
    initializePieces(Board board, List<Player> players)
    Initializes the pieces on the board based on the game mode and player count.

  • Method Details

    • getAllowedNumOfPlayers

      List<Integer> getAllowedNumOfPlayers()
      Returns a list of allowed numbers of players for the game mode.
      Returns:
      a list of integers representing allowed player counts.

    • getBoard

      Board getBoard()
      Returns a board specific to the game mode.
      Returns:
      a new Board object.

    • initializePieces

      void initializePieces(Board board, List<Player> players)
      Initializes the pieces on the board based on the game mode and player count.
      Parameters:
      board - the Board object representing the game board.
      players - the list of players participating in the game.

    • getWinner

      Player getWinner(Board board, List<Player> players)
      Checks if there is a winner at the current state of the game.
      Parameters:
      board - the Board object representing the game board.
      players - the list of players participating in the game.
      Returns:
      the Player who has won, or null if there is no winner.
